alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:04AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Custer and southwestern Pennington Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 104 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Bear Mountain Lookout, or 10 miles west of Custer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crazy Horse Memorial around 115 AM MDT. Custer, Custer State Park, Sylvan Lake and Black Elk Peak around 120 AM MDT. Stockade Lake around 125 AM MDT. Mount Coolidge, Legion Lake, Blue Bell, Center Lake and Black Hills Playhouse around 130 AM MDT. State Game Lodge around 135 AM MDT. Buffalo Corrals around 140 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
